pages.text: There are many predators in TFC for you to hunt and be hunted by. Some attack by day, some at night. If you can slay one, you'll be rewarded with plentiful meat and $(l:processes/leatherworking)Hide$().

pages.name: Bear
pages.text: The Bear attacks during the day.

pages.name: Lion
pages.text: The Lion hunts during the night.

pages.name: Sabertooth
pages.text: The Sabertooth attacks during the night.

pages.name: Polar Bear
pages.text: The Polar Bear attacks during the day.

pages.name: Hyena
pages.text: The Hyena attacks during the night.

pages.name: Panther
pages.text: The Panther hunts during the night.

pages.name: Direwolf
pages.text: The Direwolf hunts during the night.

pages.name: Jackal
pages.text: The Jackal hunts during the night.

pages.name: Black Bear
pages.text: The Black Bear hunts during the day.

pages.name: Cougar
pages.text: The Cougar hunts during the night.

pages.name: Coyote
pages.text: The Coyote hunts during the night.
